task.title: Selecting a Home Library
task.shortdesc: The last step of the online application is selecting your home library.

step.stepresult: A long list of all Fulton County library branches in alphabetical order should appear.

step.cmd: Click on the library you want to set as your home library
step.stepresult: The dropdown should close, and that name should have appeared in the box next to the label "Library"
